front.title: Static Context Header Compression (SCHC) over LoRaWAN

abstract.t: The Static Context Header Compression (SCHC) specification describes generic header compression and fragmentation techniques for Low Power Wide Area Networks (LPWAN) technologies. SCHC is a generic mechanism designed for great flexibility so that it can be adapted for any of the LPWAN technologies. This document provides the adaptation of SCHC for use in LoRaWAN networks, and provides elements such as efficient parameterization and modes of operation. This is called a profile.
